sourceOrganization.name: NIAID GVIRF Platform
sourceOrganization.abstract: The Global Vaccine and Immunization Research Forum (GVIRF) is a global platform for scientific exchange and collaboration in vaccine and immunization research. The forum facilitates discussions to advance vaccine development worldwide.
sourceOrganization.description: The Global Vaccine and Immunization Research Forum (GVIRF) is a platform for scientific exchange and engagement among vaccine and immunization research communities, intended to enhance vaccine discovery, development, and deployment.  For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/global-vaccine-immunization-research-forum
